tweet.text: In honor of the 50th anniversary of Mr. Rogers’ Neighborhood this month, check out its mention in this #FRUS document about the project “Books and Broadcasting for Children” for the International Year of the Child: https://t.co/LLkEuEVKe6 #MisterRogers50 @PBS
